replies.txt_content: 登录插件，可以在authme的语言文件Language当中修改

可不可以详细一点这两个文件里我找不到相关的文字。authme里好像没有langusge这个文件 emmm..整个服务器文件夹我都翻了好几遍，没有想上图一样找到有关的文字，

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 PY狗 于 2019-3-22 15:51 编辑 

是我记错了是这样的。修改：服务端\plugins\AuthMe\messages\messages_zhcn.yml这是语言文件
关闭：设置authme的config.yml找messageInterval: 5改为-1

replies.author: 未末丶
replies.txt_content:
mango2017 发表于 2019-3-22 15:42
authme在welcome.txt里修改
我的authme里好像没有welcome这个文件  说的应该是messages_en吧
我刚刚下载了一个notepad打开后全是英文和数字   emmm..
谢谢你的插件

replies.author: 未末丶
replies.txt_content:
PY狗 发表于 2019-3-22 15:44
是我记错了是这样的。修改：服务端\plugins\AuthMe\messages\messages_zhcn.yml这是语言文件
关闭：设置aut ...
打开authem/messages   没有找到messages_zhcn.yml  
文件里唯一有authme的地方  
[AuthMe] This /email command only available with MySQL and SQLite,
  contact an Admin'
recovery_email: '&cForgot your password? Please use /email recovery <yourEmail>'
文件中唯一有condig的地方
&fConfiguration and database has been reloaded'
timeout: '&

没有找到messageInterval：5

世予 发表于 2019-3-23 04:06
图1是Essentials的登录消息 删除步骤:
1.打开motd.txt
2.删去所有内容(不是删除文件)
unknown_user: '&fUser is not in database'
unsafe_spawn: '&fYour Quit location was unsafe, teleporting you to World Spawn'
not_logged_in: '&cNot logged in!'
reg_voluntarily: "&7\u300c&a\u4e91\u7b19\u4e4b\u68a6-\u4e16\u754c\u68a6&7\u300d&e\u8bf7\
  \u4f7f\u7528&8 \"&a/register \u5bc6\u7801 \u786e\u8ba4\u5bc6\u7801&8\"&e\u8fdb\u884c\
  \u6ce8\u518c"
usage_log: "&7\u300c&a\u4e91\u7b19\u4e4b\u68a6-\u4e16\u754c\u68a6&7\u300d&e\u7528\u6cd5\
  : &d/login \u5bc6\u7801"
wrong_pwd: "&7\u300c&a\u4e91\u7b19\u4e4b\u68a6-\u4e16\u754c\u68a6&7\u300d&e\u5bc6\u7801\
  \u9519\u8bef!"
unregistered: '&cSuccessfully unregistered!'
reg_disabled: '&cRegistration is disabled'
valid_session: '&cSession login'
login: "&7\u300c&a\u4e91\u7b19\u4e4b\u68a6-\u4e16\u754c\u68a6&7\u300d&e\u767b\u9646\
  \u6210\u529f! \u6b22\u8fce\u56de\u5230\u670d\u52a1\u5668."
vb_nonActiv: '&fYour Account isent Activated yet check your Emails!'
user_regged: '&cUsername already registered'
usage_reg: "&7\u300c&a\u4e91\u7b19\u4e4b\u68a6-\u4e16\u754c\u68a6&7\u300d&e\u7528\u6cd5\
  : &d/register \u5bc6\u7801 \u786e\u8ba4\u5bc6\u7801"
max_reg: '&fYou have Exeded the max number of Registration for your Account'
no_perm: '&cNo Permission'
error: '&fAn error ocurred; Please contact the admin'
login_msg: "&7\u300c&a\u4e91\u7b19\u4e4b\u68a6-\u4e16\u754c\u68a6&7\u300d&e\u8bf7\u4f7f\
  \u7528&8\"&a/login \u5bc6\u7801&8\"&e\u8fdb\u884c\u767b\u9646\u4e91\u7b19\u4e4b\u68a6"
reg_msg: "&7\u300c&a\u4e91\u7b19\u4e4b\u68a6-\u4e16\u754c\u68a6&7\u300d&e\u8bf7\u4f7f\
  \u7528&8 \"&a/register \u5bc6\u7801 \u786e\u8ba4\u5bc6\u7801&8\"&e\u8fdb\u884c\u6ce8\
  \u518c"
usage_unreg: '&cUsage: /unregister password'
pwd_changed: '&cPassword changed!'
user_unknown: '&cUsername not registered'
password_error: '&fPassword doesnt match'
unvalid_session: '&fSession Dataes doesnt corrispond Plaese wait the end of session'
reg_only: '&fRegistered players only! Please visit http://example.com to register'
logged_in: '&cAlready logged in!'
logout: "&7\u300c&a\u4e91\u7b19\u4e4b\u68a6-\u4e16\u754c\u68a6&7\u300d&e\u6210\u529f\
  \u767b\u51fa~!"
same_nick: "&7\u300c&a\u4e91\u7b19\u4e4b\u68a6-\u4e16\u754c\u68a6&7\u300d&e\u540c\u6837\
  \u6e38\u620f\u540d\u7684\u73a9\u5bb6\u5df2\u5b58\u5728"
registered: "&7\u300c&a\u4e91\u7b19\u4e4b\u68a6-\u4e16\u754c\u68a6&7\u300d&e\u6ce8\
  \u518c\u6210\u529f!"
pass_len: '&fYour password dind''t reach the minimum length or exeded the max length'
reload: '&fConfiguration and database has been reloaded'
timeout: '&fLogin Timeout'
usage_changepassword: '&fUsage: /changepassword oldPassword newPassword'
name_len: '&cYour nickname is too Short or too long'
regex: '&cYour nickname contains illegal characters. Allowed chars: REG_EX'
add_email: '&cPlease add your email with : /email add yourEmail confirmEmail'
bad_database_email: '[AuthMe] This /email command only available with MySQL and SQLite,
  contact an Admin'
recovery_email: '&cForgot your password? Please use /email recovery <yourEmail>'
我的全是英文
我对应着你这个文件把应该是语言的部分修改成中文或是删掉可以吗还是有让其变成中文的方法
